section: THIS JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") made and entered into this 20th day of Friday, March 2020 (the "Execution Date"), BETWEEN: BorrowMoney.com, inc of 512 Bayshore DR, suite 201 Fort Lauderdale FL 33304, and JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go of 4060 Johns Creek Parkway Suite H Suwanee, GA 30024 (individually the "Member" and collectively the "Members").
explanation: The agreement specifies the 20th day of 'Friday, March 2020'. However, March 20, 2020 was actually a Friday. This is a factual inconsistency that could cast doubt on the accuracy of the document or indicate a lack of attention to detail.

section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service.
explanation: This section lacks proper sentence structure and grammatical correctness. The phrase is not structured properly and does not make sense.

section: BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The valuation of 1,500 square feet of leased/rented office space at $3,500,000.00 USD seems highly improbable and unrealistic. This raises concerns about the fairness and accuracy of the capital contributions, potentially leading to disputes over the equity distribution in the Venture. The added wording *includingspecified Description of duty* also does not make any sense.
